title: SureFire Investments Real Estate Apartments
posting_body: Super Large 2 Bedroom 1 bath Apt, 1000 square feet, Recently remolded,  Water and Trash paid!
Mahogany Wood floors,  Ceramic tile bath and kitchen floors.

Air conditioned, Forced air heating, Gas fire place with remote control, Self cleaning range,  Washer and dryer hook ups in the apartment, or you can use the coin operated washer and dryer on the second floor all inside the building next door.
Recessed lighting through out, Ceiling fans in living room and bedrooms with speed controls switches, Large walk in closet in master bdrm.
Dimmer switches on most lights, Located close to hospitals, bus stop, Ice cream store in store front across the street, Safeway 5 blocks away.
Street Parking with permit from the city.
Realtor/Broker Managed by SureFire Investments Real Estate.
